missions.name: Wondertrade with a level higher than 13

rewardItem.name: Cipher Ball
rewardItem.description: A somewhat different Poké Ball that is more effective when attempting to catch Poison- or Psychic-type Pokémon.

rewardPokemon.name: Torchic
rewardPokemon.description: Torchic has a place inside its body where it keeps its flame. Give it a hug—it will be glowing with warmth. This Pokémon is covered all over by a fluffy coat of down.

missions.name: Participate in a public battle using dark type

rewardItem.name: Dark Stone
rewardItem.description: A stone that makes certain species of Pokémon evolve. It is said that the stone's color determines the Pokémon that will evolve.

rewardPokemon.name: His Growlithe
rewardPokemon.description: They patrol their territory in pairs. I believe the igneous rock components in the fur of this species are the result of volcanic activity in its habitat.

rewardItem.name: IV Reset
rewardItem.description: Completely changes the individual values of a Pokémon.
